name: recommend
description: Fetches a recommendation for a given experiment ID using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

experiment_id.description: The ID of the experiment for which to fetch recommendations.

name: software_assets
description: Fetch details of SaaS/Software tools based on specified feature tags or software name.

q.description: Query string representing the list of feature tags or the name of the software for which details are to be fetched.

name: read_user
description: Fetch user details from the IronWifi API using the provided user ID.

user_id.description: The ID of the user to be fetched.

name: get_case_by_id
description: Fetch the case payload from the Yardillo API using the given case ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the case to fetch.

name: city_list
description: Fetches a list of valid cities for a given province using the Canadian Gas Prices API.

province.description: The name of the province for which to fetch the list of cities.

name: label_templates
description: Fetches a list of label templates filtered by various parameters such as paper format, brand, label size, and shape.

format.description: The paper format, either 'Letter' (8.5 inch by 11 inch) or 'A4' (210 mm by 297 mm).

brand.description: The name of the label manufacturer. Default is 'avery'. Possible values include 'Avery', 'Herma', 'Onlinelabels', 'Uline', 'Megastar', 'Sheetlabels'.

code.description: A string representing approximate label sizes in the format [width]x[height]. Default is '2x2'.

shape.description: The shape of the label. Valid values include 'square', 'rectangle', 'circle', 'oval'.

name: label_template_brands
description: Returns the list of blank label sheet brands supported by Ecardify on the given date.

format.description: The paper size format, which can be either "Letter" (8.5 inch by 11 inch) or "A4" (210 mm by 297 mm).

name: get_all_images_of_an_collection
description: Fetches all images from a specified collection using the Pulsar6 API.

is_id.description: The ID of the collection to retrieve images from.

name: similar
description: Search for visually similar images to a given image ID from a previous search result.

image_id.description: The image ID of the image from the search results for which to find visually similar images.

number.description: The number of similar images to retrieve. Defaults to 10.

name: logo_api
description: Fetches the logo for a given domain using the RapidAPI logo service.

domain.description: The domain name for which the logo is to be fetched.

name: read_vault_by_name
description: Fetches vault details by the given vault name using the Yardillo API.

name.description: The name of the vault to fetch details for.

name: read_group
description: Fetches information of a specific group from the IronWiFi API using the given group ID.

group_id.description: The ID of the group to retrieve information for.

name: list_folder_contents
description: Retrieves the contents of a specified Github repository folder using the Git Pager API.

repo.description: The repository name in the format 'owner/repo'. Defaults to 'gina305/switch-code'.

path.description: The filepath within the repository. Defaults to '/'.

key.description: The access token for Github API authentication.

name: label_sizes
description: Fetches a list of label sizes in the specified format from the RapidAPI service.

format.description: The paper size format. Can be either "Letter" for 8.5 inch by 11 inch, or "A4" for 210 mm by 297 mm.

brand.description: The label manufacturer's name. Defaults to 'avery'. Possible values include "Avery", "Herma", "Onlinelabels", "Uline", "Megastar", and "Sheetlabels".

name: convert_url_to_image
description: Converts a URL to an image by making a GET request to the Cloudlayer.io API.

url.description: The URL to be converted to an image.

timeout.description: The request timeout in milliseconds. Defaults to None.

name: get_campaign_lead_from_id
description: Retrieve lead information from a campaign using its ID via the Fomo API.

is_id.description: The ID of the campaign to retrieve the lead information from.

name: search_company_by_name
description: Search for company information by name using the RapidAPI service.

page.description: The page number for paginated results.

limit.description: The maximum number of results per page.

companyname.description: The name of the company to search for.

name: check_wordpress
description: Checks whether the specified URL is running WordPress using the provided User-Agent and RapidAPI key.

user_agent.description: The User-Agent string to include in the request headers.

url.description: The URL of the website to check for WordPress.

name: get_product_reviews
description: Retrieves reviews for a specific product associated with a given app key from Yotpo.

count.description: The number of reviews to fetch.

page.description: The page number to fetch reviews from.

app_key.description: The application key assigned after signing up with Yotpo (www.yotpo.com).

domain_key.description: The unique identifier of the product.

name: download_zip
description: Downloads a ZIP file of images from a specified collection using the provided RapidAPI key.

collectionid.description: The ID of the image collection to download.

name: getprofile
description: Retrieve the profile information of a specified Snapchat user using the RapidAPI.

username.description: The Snapchat username of the profile to retrieve.

name: get_campaign_from_url
description: Fetches campaign data from the Fomo API based on a specified campaign ID and optional URL.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

url.description: The URL to be included in the query. Defaults to 'gogofodo.com'.

name: search_company_by_email
description: Searches for companies associated with a given email using the B2B Hint RapidAPI service.

email.description: The email address to search for associated companies.

name: proxy_get
description: Fetches a list of proxies based on specified parameters.

type.description: The type of proxy to retrieve. Possible values are 'http', 'https', 'socks4', 'socks5'. Default is 'http'.

country.description: A two-letter country code to filter proxies by country. For more information about country codes, refer to https://www.nationsonline.org/oneworld/country_code_list.htm. Default is 'US'.

anonymity.description: The level of anonymity required. Possible values are 'high', 'anonymous', 'transparent'. Default is 'high'.

name: viewrecords
description: Fetch records from a specified Zoho Creator view or report using the Zoho Creator API.

scope.description: The scope of the request, indicating what data the request is allowed to access.

authtoken.description: Authentication token for accessing the Zoho Creator API.

applinkname.description: The unique link name of the Zoho Creator application.

zc_ownername.description: The owner name of the Zoho Creator account.

viewlinkname.description: The specific view or report from which to fetch records.

raw.description: Whether to fetch raw data. Defaults to 'True'.

criteria.description: Criteria to filter the records. Defaults to '(Country == "US")'.

startindex.description: The starting index for fetching records. Defaults to '0'.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to fetch. Defaults to '100'.
